
```{r, eval=params$data_columns != "Dates of onset and total deaths only"}
cfr_rolling <- cfr_rolling(
  data = data_for_cfr
)

ggplot(cfr_rolling) +
  geom_ribbon(
    aes(
      x = date, ymin = severity_low, ymax = severity_high,
    ),
    alpha = 0.5,
    fill = pale_green
  ) +
  geom_line(
    aes(
      x = date, y = severity_estimate
    ),
    color = dark_green
  ) +
  labs(
    x = "Date", y = "CFR"
  ) +
  theme_classic()
```
